wiki.name: Wikipedia
wiki.slogan: Nyimdzee a ɔwɔ hɔ ma obiara
wiki.language-button-text: Kenkan wikipedia wɔ wo kasaa mu
wiki.footer-description: Wikipedia yɛ Wikimedia Foundation dze, kuw a wɔnngye sika a wɔsan wɔ dwumadzi pii a wodzi.

app-links.title: Twe Wikipedia to fuon do
app-links.description: Sie wo nkyerɛwsɛm a epɛ ama eetum aakenkan no ber a ennsɔɔ wo deta. Ma w'akenkandze no nyɛ kor wɔ mfir ahorow do na nam wikipedia aapo do sesa w'akenkan suahu dɛ mbrɛ epɛ.

wiktionary.name: Wiktionary
wiktionary.slogan: Nkyerɛase nwoma a inntua ho hwee
wiktionary.language-button-text: Kenkan wikipedia wɔ wo kasaa mu

wikibooks.name: wikimbuukuu
wikibooks.language-button-text: Kenkan Wikimbuukuu wɔ wo kasaa mu

wikinews.name: wikikdawurbɔ
wikinews.slogan: Bea a yebenya dawurbɔ a yenntua ho hwee

wikiquote.name: wikianomusɛm
wikiquote.slogan: Anomusɛm tɔfa tsiaba a inntua ho hwee

wikivoyage.name: Wikivoyage
wikivoyage.slogan: Akwantu ho akyerɛkyerɛdze a yenntua ho hwee

commons.name: Nkasaho
commons.slogan: Mfonyin na ndzɛmba a ɔkeka ho a ibotum dze ayɛ biribiara

mediawiki.slogan: Wiki aapo a no mu da hɔ a inntua ho hwee
